name: Go With the Flow Behavioral Health
specialty: Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Go With the Flow Behavioral Health is a Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Las Vegas, NV. From 2018-01 through 2018-07, this provider received $286K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 551 beneficiaries, billing 7 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.4× the national median for H0034 (H0034), at $138 per claim vs. the median of $57, placing them above the 75th percentile.
Billing stopped in 2018-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
